column4: hi, i installed 7.0.4, but my wireless card just doesn't get detected
lspci doesn't list it, iwconfig doesn't list it
it's a acer laptop
can someone help me with that?
put the output of lspci -vv on pastebin
a sec
http://rafb.net/p/71kDoe19.html
i dont konw what to tell you, that broadcom 4401 is your ethernet right?
it's the wired interface
is the cb1410 your wireless perhaps?
iuno
its not a cardbus is it?
no, it's internal
the light on the wireless thing isn't on.
what is the model of the laptop
Acer Aspire 5610
do you even have a wireless card? i cant seem to find one lol
ya, been using it for a year now
hehe. well, I'm gonna reinstall windows on it to see if the wireless will come back
i'll deal with ubunty later
http://support.acer-euro.com/drivers/notebook/as_5610.html  that lists the drivers for it, i dont see one for a wireless card
you would if you scroll down a little
